About Me

Cybersecurity Analyst with a strong SOC background and a threat-focused mindset. Experienced in monitoring large-scale environments, detecting malicious activity through SIEM platforms, and conducting structured investigations.

I focus on alert quality, detection logic, and root-cause analysis, with hands-on exposure to malware triage, phishing analysis, and DFIR-oriented investigations.

Comfortable working in remote and international teams, collaborating across SOC, IT, and engineering functions.

Specialization

SIEM, Threat Hunting, Incident Response, DFIR, Malware Triage

Location

Remote / International-ready

Focus Areas
